articles.title: Nicholas Braun 'sobbed' saying goodbye to Matthew Macfadyen as they shot final Succession scenes - Daily Mail
articles.description: Braun told Sunday Times Style magazine: 'God, I love Matthew. I just feel extremely close to him - when we finished shooting the last season I sobbed saying goodbye.'
articles.content:
Nicholas Braun has described his devastation at having to part ways with Succession co-star Matthew Macfadyen after they finished filming the final season.
